feed.subtitle: 游戏开发学习资源分享

entry.title: Animation Baking Studio (3D to 2D)
entry.content: You can take pictures of various 3D models in various directions. Output files are sprite sheets, animation clips, normal maps, and etc. that can be used for 2D or 2.5D games.

entry.title: Animation Baking Studio (3D to 2D)
entry.content: 您可以从不同方向拍摄各种3D模型。输出文件包括精灵表、动画剪辑、法线贴图等，这些可以用于2D或2.5D游戏。

entry.title: Modern UI Pack
entry.content:
Modern UI Pack is a clean, minimalistic, and stylish UI package designed for users seeking enhanced and rich-featured UI elements. It is easy to use and fully customizable.

Easily create sleek and customizable UI elements for your game or app!


• UI Manager

Instead of changing objects one by one, you change the whole look of your UI within seconds - all using the UI Manager!


• Editor Tools

Instead of tweaking things one by one, tweak them all in seconds using the editor tools. add or change almost everything within Unity, no need to deal with code or external tools.


• Demo Scene

Includes a fully-featured demo scene demonstrating how MUIP components work and look.


• Native UI Support

Modern UI Pack is made using the native Unity UI, allowing you to continue working as you're used to and even use third-party UGUI extensions with it.


• Over 18 Diverse UI Elements

Animated Icons, Buttons, Context Menu, Dropdown, Horizontal Selector, Icons, Input Fields, Modal Windows, Multi Selectable Dropdown, Notifications, Pie Chart, Progress Bars, Radial Slider, Sliced Borders, Sliders, Switches, Toggles, Tooltip, Window Manager...


...and many more additional components!


If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback, feel free to contact me.


Website | Discord Server | Documentation | Windows Demo


Please expand 'Technical Details' for important details.

entry.title: Modern UI Pack
entry.content:
现代UI包是一个干净、简约且时尚的UI包，旨在为寻求增强和丰富功能UI元素的用户提供服务。它易于使用且完全可定制。

轻松为您的游戏或应用程序创建流畅且可定制的UI元素！

• UI管理器

您可以在几秒钟内更改整个UI的外观，而不是逐个更改对象——这一切都通过UI管理器完成！

• 编辑器工具

您可以使用编辑器工具在几秒钟内调整所有内容，而不是逐个调整。几乎可以在Unity中添加或更改所有内容，无需处理代码或外部工具。

• 演示场景

包括一个功能齐全的演示场景，展示MUIP组件的工作原理和外观。

• 原生UI支持

现代UI包使用原生Unity UI制作，允许您继续按照习惯工作，甚至可以与第三方UGUI扩展一起使用。

• 超过18种多样的UI元素

动画图标、按钮、上下文菜单、下拉菜单、水平选择器、图标、输入框、模态窗口、多选下拉菜单、通知、饼图、进度条、径向滑块、切片边框、滑块、开关、切换、工具提示、窗口管理器……

……还有许多其他附加组件！

如果您有任何问题、建议或反馈，请随时联系我。

网站 | Discord服务器 | 文档 | Windows演示


请扩展'技术细节'以获取重要信息。

entry.title: Lumen: Stylized Light FX
entry.content:
Bring the light back into your project with Lumen: Stylized Light FX! Quickly prototype, save, recolor, and instantiate light flares and sun rays with the onboard tools.

CONNECT WITH US:

Website | Email | Discord | Playable Demo


Distant Lands presents:

Lumen: Stylized Light FX


Create beautiful stylized light effects ranging from light flares to halos to god rays to scatters! Lumen is a one-stop solution to stylized, performant volumetric lighting in stylized games.


Features THREE DIFFERENT SYSTEMS of light that work together to dramatically stylize your game worlds:


Do the lights in your scene feel lackluster? Do you want your audience to feel the warmth of the lights in your game? LUMEN LIGHT FLARES add a subtle halo to the lights in your scene providing an effect similar to that of volumetric point lights. This effect can be turned to the extreme as well filling your scenes with majestic glow and powerful auras—a must for any mystical item that your players may encounter!


The LUMEN STATIC RAYS are a simple way to achieve any sort of volumetric ray. Godrays, sunshafts, spotlights, 2D, 3D, or anything in between, these rays do it all! Use these to add interest to your scene, direct the player's eye to important locations, fill the scene with moody lighting, or just make your scenes even prettier!


Finally, LUMEN DYNAMIC RAYS use vertex colors and a custom shader to dynamically scale and contort the rays to a specific angle in real-time! Use these rays to track the sun dynamically, point rays at a moving target, or fake real-time volumetric lighting!


WHY MESH-BASED EFFECTS?

Built on a mesh-based, procedural material, Lumen throws out all of the calculations that most volumetric lighting solutions need by replacing the traditional mathematics with a simple vertex lit shader! This allows your effects to be calculated cheaply so that you can focus on the aesthetics of your scene, without worrying about the framerate decreasing. Beyond this, the lack of textures allows your disk space to be minimized without reducing the quality of the flares and rays that make your scene beautiful!


Powerful tools to light your world:

  • Scriptable object backend for quick and easy saving.
  • A fully 3D mesh-based workflow means that effects can be infinitely scaled with no loss in quality!
  • Dynamic and customizable depth fading that allows you to display and hide the light effects based on the depth of the scene.
  • Advanced camera fading that fades light effects in and out based on the distance to the camera.
  • Custom layering system for easy customization.
  • Lightweight shader built-in with GPU instancing support
  • The custom noise-based variation system smoothly interpolates light effects to a different color. Useful for everything from subtle, lazy light movement to sporadic, violent lighting.
  • Global, local, and per-layer controls give you ultimate control over the way that you want the light to render in your scene.
  • All shaders are built with Amplify Shader Editor for easy customization across Built-in and URP!

Come prepared with out-of-the-box features:

  • 42 Premade light effects
  • 89 Light shapes
  • Two main shader types
  • Full inspector extensions built with quick and easy editing in mind from the start
  • Fully supports Built-In and URP for any platform!

entry.title: Lumen: Stylized Light FX
entry.content:
将光线带回您的项目中，使用Lumen: 风格化光效！快速原型设计、保存、重新着色和实例化光晕和阳光射线，使用内置工具。

与我们联系：

网站 | 电子邮件 | Discord | 可玩演示

Distant Lands呈现：

Lumen: 风格化光效

创建美丽的风格化光效，从光晕到光环，再到神光和散射！Lumen是风格化游戏中高效体积光照的一站式解决方案。

特点三种不同的光源系统，共同作用以显著风格化您的游戏世界：

您场景中的光线是否显得平淡无奇？您想让观众感受到您游戏中光线的温暖吗？LUMEN光晕为您场景中的光源添加微妙的光环效果，提供类似于体积点光源的效果。这个效果可以极端化，使您的场景充满壮丽的光辉和强大的光环——这是任何玩家可能遇到的神秘物品的必备效果！

LUMEN静态光线是实现任何类型体积光线的简单方法。神光、阳光束、聚光灯、2D、3D或介于两者之间的任何东西，这些光线都能做到！使用这些光线为您的场景增添趣味，引导玩家的视线到重要位置，填充场景以营造氛围，或仅仅让您的场景更加美丽！


最后，LUMEN DYNAMIC RAYS 使用顶点颜色和自定义着色器，实时动态缩放和扭曲光线到特定角度！使用这些光线动态追踪太阳，指向移动目标，或伪造实时体积光照！

为什么选择基于网格的效果？

基于网格的程序材质构建，Lumen 通过用简单的顶点光照着色器替代传统数学，抛弃了大多数体积光照解决方案所需的所有计算！这使得您的效果可以以低成本计算，从而让您专注于场景的美学，而无需担心帧率下降。除此之外，缺乏纹理使得您的磁盘空间得以最小化，而不降低使您的场景美丽的光晕和光线的质量！


强大的工具点亮你的世界：

  • 可脚本化对象后端，便于快速和轻松地保存。
  • 完全基于3D网格的工作流程意味着效果可以无限缩放而不会损失质量！
  • 动态且可自定义的深度渐变，允许你根据场景的深度显示和隐藏光效。
  • 先进的相机渐变，根据与相机的距离淡入淡出光效。
  • 自定义分层系统，便于轻松定制。
  • 内置轻量级着色器，支持GPU实例化。
  • 自定义基于噪声的变体系统，平滑地将光效插值到不同的颜色。适用于从微妙、懒散的光移动到偶发、剧烈的照明。
  • 全局、本地和每层控制，给予你对场景中光线渲染方式的终极控制。
  • 所有着色器均使用Amplify Shader Editor构建，便于在内置和URP之间进行轻松定制！

准备好开箱即用的功能：

  • 42种预制光效
  • 89种光形状
  • 两种主要着色器类型
  • 从一开始就考虑快速和轻松编辑的完整检查器扩展
  • 完全支持任何平台的内置和URP！

entry.title: 2D Fantasy sprite bundle
entry.content:
Create unique landscapes with sprite shapes and hand-drawn sprites,perfect for 2d games like side-scrollers or platformers.

2D Fantasy sprite bundle is a bundle that includes 9 assets wtih a price discount of ~50%.


Assets in bundle:

-Island sprite pack,

-Forest sprite pack,

-Dungeon sprite pack,

-Mountains sprite pack,

-Old forest sprite pack,

-Ice and Snow sprite pack,

-Lava dungeon sprite pack,

-Desert sprite pack,

-Underwater sprite pack,

-Spring forest sprite pack,

-Crystal dungeon sprite pack,

-Abandoned station sprite pack.


Roadmap for this Bandle:


-Asian theme ,

-Flying lands sprite pack ,

-Mechanical area sprite pack .

and more....

entry.title: 2D Fantasy sprite bundle
entry.content:
创建独特的景观，使用精灵形状和手绘精灵，完美适用于像横版卷轴或平台游戏这样的2D游戏。

2D幻想精灵包是一个包含9个资产的捆绑包，价格折扣约为50%。

捆绑包中的资产：

-岛屿精灵包,

-森林精灵包,

-古老森林精灵包,

-冰雪精灵包,

-熔岩地下城精灵包,

-沙漠精灵包,

-水下精灵包,

-春季森林精灵包,

该捆绑包的路线图：

-亚洲主题,

-飞行土地精灵包,

-机械区域精灵包.

还有更多....

entry.title: UI Node Connect 4
entry.content:
UI Node Connect 4 is a customizable runtime UGUI Node Graph Framework that facilitates the creation of interactive node graph interfaces inside your Game or App.

The UI Node Connect 4 is a runtime UGUI Node Graph Framework with Nodes, Ports and Connections, drag and drop, a custom UI line renderer and useful features to create node graphs, flowcharts, circuit boards, connection puzzles, among other creative ways for the users to interact with your game or app.


📚 Documentation

📚 Code Reference

🎮 Logic Gates Sample Scene


Customize the asset with your own sprites, texts, colors, buttons and expand it by adding new features using the API to hook up to events and analyze the Nodes, Ports and Connections.

Make the Canvas part of your gameplay by adding a new interaction way for the users to manipulate and connect Nodes to each other.

entry.title: UI Node Connect 4
entry.content:
UI Node Connect 4 是一个可定制的运行时 UGUI 节点图框架，便于在您的游戏或应用程序中创建交互式节点图界面。

UI Node Connect 4 是一个 运行时 UGUI 节点图框架，具有节点、端口和连接、拖放功能、自定义 UI 线渲染器以及创建节点图、流程图、电路板、连接谜题等多种创意方式的实用功能，供用户与您的游戏或应用程序进行交互。

📚 文档

📚 代码参考

🎮 逻辑门示例场景

使用您自己的精灵、文本、颜色、按钮自定义资产，并通过使用 API 添加新功能来扩展它，以 连接到事件 并分析 节点、端口和连接。

通过为用户添加新的交互方式，使画布成为您游戏玩法的一部分，以便操纵和连接节点。
